exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall u : nat -> Rbar, is_sup_seq u (Sup_seq u)" on hypothesis of type "Rbar_lt M (Sup_seq u)".
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

In environment u : nat -> Rbar M : R n : nat Hn : Rbar_lt M (u n) Unable to unify "match Sup_seq ?M2372 with | Finite l => forall eps : posreal, (forall n : nat, Rbar_lt (?M2372 n) (l + eps)) /\\ (exists n : nat, Rbar_lt (l - eps) (?M2372 n)) | p_infty => forall M : R, exists n : nat, Rbar_lt M (?M2372 n) | m_infty => forall (M : R) (n : nat), Rbar_lt (?M2372 n) M end" with "match Sup_seq u with | Finite y => M < y | p_infty => True | m_infty => False end".
In environment u : nat -> Rbar M : R n : nat Hn : Rbar_lt M (u n) Unable to unify "Rbar_lt M (u n)" with "Rbar_lt M (Sup_seq u)".

In environment u : nat -> Rbar M : R n : nat Hn : Rbar_lt M (u n) Unable to unify "Rbar_le ?M2372 ?M2373 -> False" with "match Sup_seq u with | Finite y => M < y | p_infty => True | m_infty => False end".

original: intros u M. split. - intro H. apply Sup_seq_correct in H. destruct H as [H _]. unfold is_sup_seq in H. specialize (H Rlt). apply H with (eps := Rlt_0_1) in H0. destruct H0 as [n Hn]. exists n. apply Hn. - intros [n Hn]. apply Sup_seq_correct. unfold is_sup_seq. intros eps. split. + intros. apply Hn. simpl. apply Rbar_lt_not_le, Rbar_plus_lt_compat_r. rewrite <- Rbar_plus_0_l. apply Rbar_lt_plus_compat; auto. + exists n. simpl. apply Rbar_lt_not_le, Rbar_plus_lt_compat_l. rewrite <- Rbar_plus_0_r. apply Rbar_lt_plus_compat; auto.
